medRCT 0.0.0.9030

medRCT

The medRCT R package provides facilities for the estimation of interventional effects that emulate a target trial.

Installation

You can install the development version of medRCT from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("T0ngChen/medRCT")
